altTitles.en: A Declaration of Love in your Ear

description.en:
1) Overthrow the student council president  
Chikage, the student council president, have his own special way to tame the hothead Misaki, but what his real feeling toward him?  
  
2) A love Declaration in your ear  
“I like you, please go out with me”.  
When I suddenly received a confession from the beautiful Tsukimura, I was surprised because we didn’t have anything in common. Then, I started receiving confessions via email every day. At first I thought he was just a weird guy, and as time went by, his emails kept coming. When I got the confessions, it’s not that was all I thought about. But by the 100th confession, the usually nice Tsukimura suddenly lashed out in a sexual assault! (From Eternal Dream)  
  
3) Keeping Secrets  
Ritsu and Sano are lovers, and now they are also roommates at their dorm, but the sudden intimacy can be a bit frightening.  
  
4) I won't give you my love  
Fujisaki fell in love in top student Mitsuba, so in order to be closer to him he worked hard to succeed in school and get high marks so he can be Mitsuba's roomate in room A, but it's seem that it's easier to excel a test than to conquer Mitsuba's heart.  
  
5) Don't understand Love?  
Continuation of Chapter 04  
  
6) You're mine (Not Scanlated)  
  
7) Our love won't stop! (Not Scanlated)
